title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Tim Bradley Jr. stops by the show
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Tim Bradley Jr. stops by the show
description:
This week, Chris is with Tim Bradley Jr. to talk about a possible Ryan Garcia - Tank Davis fight and if Ryan Garcia should even consider that fight right now. Later, Adam Kownacki stops by to talk about his two losses to Robert Helenius, what went wrong for him during those fights, and what's next for him. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
